column5: I let my curiosity get the best of me and purchased a laser lure. Tried it out yesterday and did very well in about 6-8 ft of water, caught fish on almost every third cast. Interesting lures though, although for some reason, I felt pretty dirty using them, not sure why?  Any thoughts on these lures?
Lazer? as in actual real lazers? Intersting. Never heard of them. Wouldnt mind trying one myself..

yeah, as in they flash once in the water, and it triggers bites.  I wont be buying anymore, but its fun to try once. I just dont really like fishing that way, it's too damn easy.  I fished my spots on the rainy river, as normal, and even with cold weather this past week, I still landed alot of big smallies, about 30 in two hours. Biggest was a tad under 5lbs, but the average was probably close to 4 lbs.
